question: Are Emojis shown in the FAQ search results rich snippets?
acceptedAnswer: At this time, we see Emojis showing in both the questions and answers. As you can see, this editor supports pasting in Emojis. We've also developed our Classy Emojis system based on our Classy Unicode script to help people include emojis when their CMS does not let them.

question: How do I check my training completed, or completed certificate and transcript?
acceptedAnswer: You may check your transcript and certificate at < Bentley LEARNserver  >. You may also check your learning history at My Dashboard.

question: How can I receive updates on availability of new learning resources?
acceptedAnswer: New learning resources available in the portal are notified in My Dashboard. You may also subscribe for email notification.

question: Where can I explore more training on Bentley products?
acceptedAnswer: You may explore Bentley LEARNserver.

question: Do I need any pre-installed applications or software to attend the training?
acceptedAnswer: All the courses are being hosted on the  and you do not need to download any other application to view these courses. It is recommended to download the software for practice session from Get Software

question: Are there any cost associated to access the learning resources and the training?
acceptedAnswer: Learning and Training through the Portal is complimentary.

question: How can I request for a new learning resource or learning path?
acceptedAnswer: Reach out to us  through Contact Us.

question: How do I get a product expert guidance while completing my assignments, projects, or specific training?
acceptedAnswer: Seek support by interacting with our experts at Product Communities.

question: What is the Bentley Education Program?
acceptedAnswer: Bentley Education Program provides eligible students and educators with complimentary access to educational license for Bentley products and services for one year via Home Page. This access is currently available in selected countries (Australia, Singapore, Ireland, Lithuania, United Kingdom) and will be roll out to other countries soon.

question: What is the Bentley Student & Educator Communities about?
acceptedAnswer: Bentley Student & Educator Communities connects you with your fellow students or academic colleagues to exchange ideas or anything that excites you around Infrastructure world.

question: Do I need to sign in to Bentley Student & Educator Communities?
acceptedAnswer: Yes, please use the same credentials that you used for registering in the portal.

question: I’m unable to register or update my profile?
acceptedAnswer: Please send an email at academic@bentley.com mentioning your details such as Name, email, University name, Country name and discipline of your study and we will respond at the earliest.

question: Who is eligible to complimentary software access ?
acceptedAnswer: All students enrolled and educators employed at Qualified Educational Institution are eligible to the complimentary software access , if you have an email with an institutional domain.

question: What is a “Qualified Educational Institute”?
acceptedAnswer: A “Qualified Educational Institution” is an institute that has been accredited by an authorized Governmental agency within its applicable local, state, federal, or national government with primary purpose of teaching its enrolled students.

question: I am registered in the portal but facing issue to access the complimentary software download?
acceptedAnswer: Please reach out to us through Contact Us and furnish supporting documents such as your college ID, authentication letter from institute, or an academic transcript.

question: Why am I required to confirm my eligibility for downloading the complimentary software?
acceptedAnswer: Confirming your eligibility helps to ensure the legitimate use of products and services accessed through the Portal.

question: Can a Bentley Expert help me resolve my technical query?
acceptedAnswer: You may interact with our experts at

question: How can I reach out to Bentley Education representative for additional support?
acceptedAnswer: You may reach out via <  Contact Us  >. We’ll ensure to review and reply as soon as possible.

question: Is my profile information visible to other students and educators?
acceptedAnswer: No.

question: What is the duration of my access to the complimentary software ? Can I renew when my license expires?
acceptedAnswer: One year, which starts immediately upon your successful registration on the portal. To renew license, you will need to reconfirm your eligibility by updating your profile in the portal.

question: My license is expired. What should I do?
acceptedAnswer: You can renew your license by updating your profile through the Portal.

question: Is there a limit to the number of times I can download the complimentary software ?
acceptedAnswer: No, as long as you remain eligible.

question: How do I download complimentary software?
acceptedAnswer: Students/Educators/Institutes from Australia, Singapore, Ireland, Lithuania, United Kingdom: Visit < Home Page >  and register by using your institutional email. After successful registration, accept the terms and conditions to download the software. If your country is not in this list, stay tuned for the future updates as we expand this program to more countries.

question: How do I access complimentary software download if I am not from the mentioned countries?
acceptedAnswer: Students/Educators/Institutes from other countries: Register at Home Page (if you do not have Bentley account). Navigate to STUDENTserver to use your unique school code provided by your faculty/ Institute Lab administrator for software download

question: Can I download and install Bentley’s products on multiple machines?
acceptedAnswer: Yes. However, at any point in time, only one user can use Bentley’s product and services with your access.

question: Can I use the software for non-education purposes?
acceptedAnswer: No. These software are meant to be used for educational purpose.

question: Why did my license stop working?
acceptedAnswer: If you no longer have access, it is likely that your license has expired. The license is renewable provided you are an eligible student or educator.

question: As an eligible Education Institute, can we install software on multiple computers in classroom or computer lab?
acceptedAnswer: Yes. Educators and Institute administrators who confirm their eligibility can download and install the software on multiple machines. Students and educators can work on these machines by either using their own login or using an admin’s login details.

question: I am home schooled. Am I eligible for complimentary software download?
acceptedAnswer: Yes. Please send us request through Contact Us. We will review it and reply at the earliest.

question: Is there a limit to the number of products that I can access through the Portal?
acceptedAnswer: No. You can access any Bentley products through the Portal.

question: Can I share software with others?
acceptedAnswer: The complimentary software is individually licensed for eligible students and educators. If you have colleagues who want to use the software, they should register through the Portal.

question: My Institute has Bentley Academic SELECT subscription for multiple year. What happens to my existing Classroom/ Lab license for remaining years?
acceptedAnswer: Your existing Classroom/ Lab license will continue till the end of contract period. Upon contract expiry, you can take advantage of this program (if eligible) or renew your Academic SELECT Subscription.

question: I’m a K12/Secondary School student. How do I access the complimentary software download?
acceptedAnswer: Please ask your teacher or computer lab administrator to reach us through Contact Us .

question: My Institute has a valid Bentley Academic SELECT subscription. How is it going to be affected?
acceptedAnswer: If you have a valid Academic SELECT subscription, you may continue to take benefits as included in the Academic SELECT subscription till the end of your contract.

question: I work at an accredited educational institution and like to get licenses for the development of internal projects/services. Am I eligible for a complimentary software download?
acceptedAnswer: No. The complimentary software download are only meant to be used for educational purposes.

question: As an eligible education institution, do we have to sign a contract?
acceptedAnswer: No, you don't have to sign a contract.

question: I am an academic research student in an eligible/qualified educational institution. Am I eligible for complimentary software download?
acceptedAnswer: Research can be conducted with complimentary  products and services, provided that your institution meets the definition of a qualified educational institution and the research forms a part of the instructional functions of your educational institution.

question: I am a research student in an eligible educational institution and working on a commercially funded research project. Am I eligible for complimentary software download?
acceptedAnswer: Complimentary software download can be utilized only for not-for-profit research. Since your research project is commercially funded, you will need to use Bentley's commercial licenses. You may reach out at Sales Contact Us

question: How can I contact the support team?
acceptedAnswer:
As an authenticated user of the  , you can leverage Bentley’s Student & Educators Communities, to seek support for your questions by interacting with our experts and your peers
•	Technical Query to Product Communities 
•	Any other issue <Bentley Student Communities > and < Bentley Educator Communities > 
You can also reach out to us via the Contact Us.

question: Can you guide me how to download the complimentary software?
acceptedAnswer: With your successful registration in the Portal, either click on <Get Software> to choose the product you wish to download or choose the product you wish to download from the Product page.

question: Why is it important to update my profile?
acceptedAnswer: Your profile is an important step to have a better experience on the portal and it may recommend activities and learning resources relevant to your interests and region.
